mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tas_board ( board_category, board_writer, board_email, board_content, board_security, board_password ) VALUES ( #{boardCategory}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardEmail}, #{boardContent}, #{isBoardSecurity}, #{boardPassword} )
mapper.select: SELECT board_no as boardNo, board_category as boardCategory, board_writer as boardWriter, board_email as boardEmail, board_content as boardContent, board_security as isBoardSecurity, board_password as boardPassword, board_date as boardDate, board_cnt as boardCnt, board_comment as boardComment, board_is_comment as isBoardComment FROM tas_board
mapper.update: UPDATE tas_board SET board_category = #{boardCategory}, board_writer = #{boardWriter}, board_email = #{boardEmail}, board_content = #{boardContent}, board_security = #{boardSecurity}, board_password = #{boardPassword} WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
